notesStmt.note:
Eliyahu Anav: inscribed with his name, undated (folio 1r).
Laurentius Franguellus (fl. until 1596): inscribed with his name, 1575 (folio 182v); see 78, appendix § 105-110.
Hippolite of Ferrara, Franciscan (active 1590-1609, in Cremona?): inscribed with his name, 1601 (folio 182v), see 18-19, 93.
Giovanni Domenico Vistorini: inscribed 'Gio. Dom. Vistorini 1609' (folio 182v), see 85-87.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: Sefer ha-zohar on the book of Genesis.

collation.p: Quires: i-xxii8 (folios 1-176), xxiii8-1 (folios 176-183). Catchwords at the end.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Italian semi-cursive script of the 15th century. Shelomoh (?): marked off, folio 181r.
